text: The simulation used data extracted from the cross-sectional studies included in the analysis of the 11 cross-sectional studies on sensitivity and specificity (see Web Annexes B and C).For the purposes of the model, the costs of dual-stain triage testing were assumed to be equivalent to those of LBC as a triage, and the model was validated against the available longitudinal evidence.
